verbose_text: These experiments suggest that basal synaptic properties are unchanged in ApoER2 +/-; GRIP1 +/- mice and ApoER2 +/-; efnB2 S-9> A/+ compound mice and that the reduced LTP most likely results from a defect in expression or maintenance of LTP due to an impairment of plasticity induced insertion of additional AMPA receptors into the postsynaptic membrane.
evidence: LTP due to an impairment of plasticity-induced insertion of additional AMPA receptors
